Articles.Content: The VA Magpie is a medium-range aircraft with debatable exoatmospheric use, but with good speed, reasonable agility and a good ability to land at high speed. Its landing gear is capable of bringing the vessel to land only when the descent speed is less that 5 m/s, though with careful use of RCS, manual controls and engine thrust, this shouldn\'t be too difficult. Its military uses as a medium range cruiser or bomber make it a useful asset for militaries.
